subject: X Error
msgSnippet: Hi, I am launching JUnit through Ant, and I get the following error: [junit] X Error: BadDevice, invalid or uninitialized input device 171 [junit]   Major
messageBody:
Hi,

I am launching JUnit through Ant, and I get the following error:

[junit] X Error: BadDevice, invalid or uninitialized input device 171
[junit] Major opcode: 147
[junit] Minor opcode: 3
[junit] Resource id: 0x0
[junit] Failed to open device
[junit] X Error: BadDevice, invalid or uninitialized input device 171
[junit] Major opcode: 147
[junit] Minor opcode: 3
[junit] Resource id: 0x0
[junit] Failed to open device

Any idea how to fix it?
thanks
